author: glenwood weather
content: Regardless her age, her accomplishments are amazing. She is six years older than I and I can’t imagine even wanting to do this trip by myself.

author: Chris Roche
content: What a girl we in the Cape Horners http://www.capehorners.org salute this intrepid sailor.

author: Jean-Pierre Declemy
content: She is an extremely capable and mentally strong person and I hope she manages to finish the voyage. Her Najad might be getting a little tired though.
